name: Heaven's Front
description:
Heaven's Front is my first short game made with Godot. You will control the Heaven's Front - The largest building on this planet's orbit - to obey the planet's requests by let spaceships pass or catch them if the planet don't want them. And beware! If your action not according to the planet's request your reputation will decrease and if it reach zero, you will lose the game. How many waves you will survive before that?

Control

Spacebar: Change the frontier's direction

Escape: Pause

Credit

Design & Programming & Graphic & etc. : @Mr.Kalamplee

Music: 1821715 gregoire.lourme Exploring Galaxies

Font: iannnnnAMD 2005
